TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Gongxidaye, title = Gongxidaye, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gongxidaye} }

S.FORM: Gongxidaye(u kamu nu Lipun: Gongxidaye, 1956 a mihcaan ) i Lipun jing gang xian qing shui ding lecuhen u misakulitay a kulit tu cudad a tatama. kaliliman i Lipun mamin micudad tu talawkaway a cacudadan, Gongxidaye mamusakawaw tu sikulitay a misangaay tu kulit,u nu tademaw a kulit a kawaw nida. sisa Gongxidaye malinga tu tu pasayni nu wawaan a kuit misanga, mamin sa 1999 a mihcaan wucu nu buyu i kilakilangan makaadih tu adidiay a kiwma nu kungku kapah ayda sakapahay a nikalalitemuh kyu makaala tu tuluway a sakasengan a kawlah nu kulit. 2003 a mihcaan Gongxidaye yadah kuni papeluwan tu konglong a sasakamuwan u nu konglong a kulit tayamin , tu nu sayaway adihen mayda asu'ay sisa 2010 a mihcaan misumat tu misaungaay a kacudu; u luma a mihcaan tu cacay a bataan a bulad i nakulikulitan i Toykui a tilibi Gongxidaye pakaluwaluwah adihen mayda asu'ay (Gongxidaye pakaluwaluwah ) a adihan, misanga tu misaungaay a tilibi paadih. 2015 a mihcaan tu waluay a bulad u sakasaetimen naku a wawa kisu makaycu tu mala kacudu misaungaay inga. matatulin kina kawaw nida mikulit tu cudad, Gongxidaye misanga tu nu wawa a sapasubana tu sikulitay a cudad,sawni nisulit; atu nu Lipun a sipakungku i tatacuwacuwa. nilacul namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan(
